settings.content:
ENHANCE YOUR  FEMALE HEALTH  WITH HER PACKAGE

Beef organs are nutrient-dense and provide a wide array of essential vitamins and minerals. Our Her Package supplement is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to support hormonal balance, improve menstrual dysfunction, and increase fertility.

settings.text: 100% Hormone, Antibiotic, Pesticide, and GMO Free

settings.organ_info_desc: Liver is one of the most nutrient-dense foods available. It is particularly rich in essential nutrients such as vitamins and minerals. Some of the key nutrients found in beef liver include vitamin A, vitamin B12, vitamin B6, iron, zinc, and folate.

Kidneys contain various B vitamins, including B12, riboflavin (B2), and niacin (B3), which play important roles in energy metabolism and overall health. They are also particularly rich in heme iron, which is easily absorbed by the body.
Reproductive Organs (Ovary, Uterus and Fallopian Tubes) are a source of various nutrients, including vitamins (such as B vitamins like B12), and minerals (like zinc and selenium).

settings.content:
UNLOCK THE POWER OF ORGANS

Beef organs are the most nutrient-dense and bioavailable foods on the planet. By incorporating these potent sources of essential nutrients into your diet, you can finally address lingering nutrient inadequacies and deficiencies, paving the way for a remarkable transformation in how you feel and function.

settings.review:
Fertility of our ancestors...

“My husband and I have been trying to conceive for almost two years. After much frustration I was diagnosed with PCOS and told I don’t ovulate. They said the only way I could get pregnant was using hormones or other medications that have a huge list of side effects... With one complete cycle of taking these supplements I received a positive pregnancy test.”
settings.name: Elizabeth

settings.review:
Will keep buying...

“Since taking Her Package regularly, and doing literally nothing else differently, I have experienced very little to no cramping during my periods - and this was not a result i was expecting! I don’t think i have ever been able to go through a period without a heat pad and pain relievers. This is simply amazing to me.”
settings.name: Nichole

settings.review:
Hot flashes and night sweats gone!

“My hot flashes and night sweats are GONE! My period has returned to a predictable, stable pattern. I recently had some bloodwork done and the doctor said my estrogen and progesterone levels were perfect; she said I was a true testament to the value of these supplements.”
settings.name: Julie

settings.review:
Awesome product...

I really love this product. I’ve used a few different Heart and Soil supplements before, and I have to say I’ve liked all of them! But this one was by far the best! It cured my pcos! Not to mention it tremendously helped heal my acne. I would absolutely recommend this product!
settings.name: Anna

settings.info:
Start Slowly for Best Results

 Start with one capsule every other day for two full weeks. Then increase by one capsule every two weeks. It’s important to introduce Her Package slowly, because the ingredients can have a powerful effect. Many women feel best taking just one capsule per day indefinitely. Ask us if you need help!

Daily Routine Made Easy

 Our freeze-drying process preserves key nutrients in a taste-free capsule that’s easy for anyone to take. Because it’s simply real food, it can be taken with or without a meal.

Heart & Soil Standard 

Rigorous third-party testing and a 60-day satisfaction guarantee. No junk or fillers, sourced from regenerative farms, and free from pesticides, GMO and antibiotics.
